DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study is designed to obtain preliminary data on the safety, acceptability, and feasibility of direct-to-consumer telemedicine abortion.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility of Medical Abortion by Direct-to-Consumer Telemedicine
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this pilot study is to obtain preliminary data on the safety, acceptability, and feasibility of direct-to-consumer telemedicine abortion.
DOC.criteria: desires abortion medically ineligible for procedure
